title: 03/10/22 DPS Best OF
itunes:title: 03/10/22 DPS Best OF
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Chris "Mad Dog" Russo about the MLB Lockdown. When does he expect the two sides to come to an agreement? The guys discuss which song makes them change the channel. And Jason Clarke tells us about playing Jerry West in the HBO's new series about the Showtime Lakers
